page.title: 09Playground Games
page.content: One of my favourite games at school is called Man Hunt.You must have more than two people to play.One person counts to 100 while the others hide.After a count of 100 the search begins for the people who are hiding.They try to get back to the den and shout Man Hunt.If the person who counts spots them running to the den she tries to reach there before them,to shout Man Hunt.If successful, the person is trapped in the den.The last person to be found can free all the others if she reaches the den and shouts Man Hunt before the counter.If this happened the same counter would be out again and the game continues as before. by Jennifer Hubbard. --------------------
